title: New Spain
summary: New Spain, officially the Viceroyalty of New Spain (Spanish: Virreinato de la Nueva España, Spanish pronunciation: [birejˈnato ðe ˈnweβa esˈpaɲa] (listen)), or Kingdom of New Spain, was an integral territorial entity of the Spanish Empire, established by Habsburg Spain during the Spanish colonization of the Americas. It covered a huge area that included what are now Mexico, much of the American Southwest and California in North America, Central America, northern parts of South America, and several Pacific Ocean archipelagos, namely the Philippines and Guam.
